title: Skill Standardization Schema
description: Establish a consistent structure for all SKILL.md files by introducing mandatory YAML frontmatter containing searchable metadata (name, tags, intent) and a standardized ## Examples section with few-shot Q&A pairs. This separates 'searchable signal' from 'executable payload,' enabling future indexing while improving model accuracy through concrete usage examples.
user_impact: Enables semantic skill discovery and improves agent accuracy through few-shot examples
